content.rendered:
Located just a stone’s throw from Gatwick Airport’s perimeter with views of the planes taking off. Just a five-minute drive to the terminal with friendly staff always on-hand to ensure your stay is relaxed and enjoyable – we make the perfect beginning or end to any trip.

To check availability and pricing, please call through to our booking team on: 01293 223939 or feel free to check on the website. and book directly here.

The Maple Manor Hotel boasts 12 beautifully renovated en-suite bedrooms, a restaurant and a lounge for guests to relax in. Formally known as the Flight Tavern Public House until 2013, it has been refurbished extensively to bring you a charming boutique Gatwick airport hotel with a difference.

Rooms & Facilities

Rooms are all luxuriously appointed providing everything you would need for an overnight stay, from bathrobes and White Company Toiletry sets, to tea and coffee making facilities, home-baked biscuits and flat screen TVs. With rooms available to suit all requirements (from family suites to single rooms for individual travellers) as well as on-site parking packages, there is something for everyone here at The Maple Manor Hotel.

    • 12 Rooms available
    • Restaurant
    • Airport parking available on-site
    • Licensed Bar
    • Secure overnight parking included
    • Located 5 minutes away from Gatwick Airport

We offer some great value on-site airport parking packages when staying at Maple Parking, and the hotel is located just 5 minutes drive from Gatwick Airport, with views of the planes taking off.  To check availability and pricing, please call through to our booking team on: 01293 223939 or feel free to check on the website. and book directly here.

“Small & New, clean with good food. Very quiet. Staff were great and went above and beyond to make my stay fantastic. Arranged transport to and from Gatwick Airport and ensured I was there on time (even though I overslept). Very affordable also.” – Stephen L

Most importantly our customer focussed team is on-hand 24 hours a day to assist you from the moment you walk through the door, we strive to make your stay with us one to remember leaving you wanting to come back and visit time after time.

If you’re ready to take a break from the large corporate hotel chains, book a hotel and airport parking with Maple Parking. You’ll enjoy hassle free parking and a wonderful nights sleep at a small hotel, with a very big heart.

Book Now
